txt.en: 'Best be careful not to fall in the Brandywine...you're like to get swept clear down to Brandy Hall.'
'The fish have been as spooked as much as the hobbits lately.'
'We used to pull an occasional carp from the river, but lately it's just perch. What I wouldn't give for some carp!'
'Cast and wait, cast and wait...that's the life of a fisherman.'
